name: AaveConcierge
description: A set of tools to interact with the Aave V3 protocol on behalf of a user. It can check loan health, supply assets, borrow assets, and repay debt.

tools.name: check_aave_health
tools.description: Checks the Aave V3 health factor for a user's loan position to see how close they are to liquidation. A health factor below 1.0 means the position can be liquidated.

path_parameters.name: user_address
path_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user to check, e.g., '0x10c959Cf9994e95fc7354855c0f2Bd639E499179'.

tools.name: supply_assets_to_aave
tools.description: Supplies a specified amount of an asset (like USDC or WETH) to the Aave V3 protocol from the executor's wallet, crediting the deposit to the user's address.

user_address.description: The wallet address of the user who will receive the supplied assets (aTokens).

asset_symbol.description: The symbol of the asset to supply, e.g., 'USDC' or 'WETH'.

amount.description: The amount of the asset to supply, e.g., 10.5.

tools.name: borrow_assets_from_aave
tools.description: Borrows a specified amount of an asset from the Aave V3 protocol. The user must have sufficient collateral and must have delegated borrow power to the executor wallet.

user_address.description: The wallet address of the user who is borrowing.

asset_symbol.description: The symbol of the asset to borrow, e.g., 'USDC'.

amount.description: The amount of the asset to borrow.

interest_rate_mode.description: The interest rate mode. Use 2 for Variable (most common) or 1 for Stable.

tools.name: repay_aave_debt
tools.description: Repays a user's debt for a specific asset using funds from the executor wallet. It will automatically detect the debt type (stable or variable) and repay as much as the executor's balance allows.

user_address.description: The wallet address of the user whose debt will be repaid.

asset_symbol.description: The symbol of the asset to repay, e.g., 'USDC'.
